title: Connection Management
text: Database connections R stateless:
code: con <- DBI::dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), dbdir = "data.duckdb") tbl1 <- dplyr::tbl(con, "table1") # ... 50 lines later: Is the connection still valid? Who closed it?

title: Connection Management
text: R6 class centralizes connection pinned tables:
code: library(dbProject)  proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_project/") proj$pin_write(my_tbl, "expression_data")  # Later (even after R restart): proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_project/") proj$reconnect() my_tbl <- proj$pin_read("expression_data")

title: Connection Management
text: dbProject works alongside DBI, instead : approaches get automatic reconnection via dbData base class.

title: Connection Management
code: proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_analysis/")  # These modify the same object - no reassignment needed proj$disconnect() proj$reconnect() proj$pin_write(my_tbl, "results")

title: Connection Management
code: proj #> ── dbProject ────────────────────────────────────────── #> ✓ Connected #> ── Board Content ────────────────────────────────────── #>   name              type #>   expression_data   tbl #> ── Database Content ─────────────────────────────────── #> ℹ Tables: expression_raw, cell_types

title: Connection Management
text: empty extract [] method dbverse objects auto-reconnects connection stale:
code: mat[]  # Can be either a DBI connection or a dbProject connection

title: Connection Management
code: proj$pin_write(my_tbl, "results")   # Save lazy table my_tbl <- proj$pin_read("results") # Restore reference proj$pin_delete("old_results")     # Clean up

title: Getting Started
text: dbProject package provides connection management local DuckDB databases. uses pins persistent storage enables automatic reconnection.

title: Getting Started
code: # Create project in temp directory project_dir <- tempfile("dbproject_demo") db_path <- file.path(project_dir, "demo.duckdb")  proj <- dbProject$new(path = project_dir, dbdir = db_path) #> Creating new version '20260113T205711Z-fe9c3' #> Writing to pin 'cachedConnection' #> Manifest file written to root folder of board, as `_pins.yaml` proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✔ Connected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       232 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Database Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d/demo.duckdb

title: Getting Started
code: # Get the connection and add data con <- proj$get_conn() mtcars_tbl <- dplyr::copy_to(con, mtcars, "mtcars", temporary = FALSE, overwrite = TRUE) mtcars_tbl #> # Source:   table<mtcars> [?? x 11] #> # Database: DuckDB 1.4.3 [unknown@Linux 6.11.0-1018-azure:R 4.5.2//tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d/demo.duckdb] #>      mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5     0     1     4     4 #>  2  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0     0     1     4     4 #>  3  22.8     4  108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6     1     1     4     1 #>  4  21.4     6  258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4     1     0     3     1 #>  5  18.7     8  360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0     0     0     3     2 #>  6  18.1     6  225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2     1     0     3     1 #>  7  14.3     8  360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8     0     0     3     4 #>  8  24.4     4  147.    62  3.69  3.19  20       1     0     4     2 #>  9  22.8     4  141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9     1     0     4     2 #> 10  19.2     6  168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3     1     0     4     4 #> # ℹ more rows

title: Getting Started
code: proj$pin_write(x = mtcars_tbl, name = "mtcars") #> Creating new version '20260113T205711Z-0482a' #> Writing to pin 'mtcars' #> Manifest file written to root folder of board, as `_pins.yaml` proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✔ Connected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       232 <pins_met> #> 2 mtcars           rds   mtcars: a pin… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       268 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Database Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d/demo.duckdb #> ℹ Tables: #> • mtcars

title: Getting Started
code: # Disconnect proj$disconnect() proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✖ Disconnected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       232 <pins_met> #> 2 mtcars           rds   mtcars: a pin… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       268 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> ℹ No active connection.  # Reconnect proj$reconnect() #>  #> Attaching package: 'connections' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:dbProject': #>  #>     connection_pin_read, read_pin_conn, write_pin_conn #> Loading required package: DBI proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✔ Connected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       232 <pins_met> #> 2 mtcars           rds   mtcars: a pin… 2026-01-13 20:57:11       268 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Database Path: /tmp/RtmpCH8z2n/dbproject_demo21de3b8ab29d/demo.duckdb #> ℹ Tables: #> • mtcars

title: Getting Started

what: Error: “Could not set lock on file”
title: Troubleshooting & FAQ
text: Cause: DuckDB uses file-level locking ensure data integrity. one process can write database file time. error occurs : Another R session connected database previous R session didn’t disconnect properly closing Multiple scripts trying access database simultaneously Solutions: Kill conflicting process (shown error message): Restart RStudio close R processes Properly disconnect closing sessions: Use read-mode concurrent access:
code: Error: Could not set lock on file "path/to/database.duckdb":  Conflicting lock is held in /path/to/R (PID 12345) by user... # Replace 12345 with the actual PID from the error kill 12345 # Always disconnect when done proj$disconnect()  # Or for direct DBI connections: DBI::dbDisconnect(con, shutdown = TRUE) # Multiple processes can read simultaneously con <- DBI::dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), dbdir = "path/to/db", read_only = TRUE)

what: Error: “No active or cached connection available”
title: Troubleshooting & FAQ
text: Cause: dbProject connection closed never established. Solution: Reconnect database:

what: Objects showing “Error: Column references …” after restart
title: Troubleshooting & FAQ
text: Cause: Lazy table references become stale R restarts connection lost. Solution: Use dbProject automatic reconnection:
code: # Create project (saves connection info) proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_project", dbdir = "data.duckdb")  # After restart, just reload proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_project", dbdir = "data.duckdb") proj$reconnect()  # Pinned objects are automatically reconnected my_data <- proj$pin_read("my_table")

what: Large datasets causing R to crash
title: Troubleshooting & FAQ
text: Cause: Accidentally collecting large lazy tables memory. Prevention: Avoid collect() large tables: Use pin_write() materialize intermediates disk:
code: # BAD - loads entire table into memory big_df <- big_table |> collect()  # GOOD - keep lazy, push computation to database and only collect what's needed result <- big_table |>    filter(gene == "BRCA1") |>   collect() # Materialize to database, not memory filtered_data <- proj$pin_write(x = lazy_filtered, name = "filtered")

what: dbMatrix: Slow operations after many transformations
title: Troubleshooting & FAQ
text: Cause: Complex lazy query chains can cause performance issues. Solution: Use dplyr::compute() pin_write() materialize intermediate results:
code: # Materialize after expensive operations complex_result <- my_dbMatrix |>   some_expensive_transform() |> # e.g. a function containing several SQL joins   dplyr::compute(name = "materialized", temporary = FALSE)

title: Troubleshooting & FAQ
text: encounter issues covered : Checkout specific dbverse package GitHub organization. Ensure ’re using latest dbverse package versions. Include minimal reproducible example reporting issues.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Add troubleshooting vignette. Make pinned tbl objects round-trip reliably. Reconnect lazy DuckDB tbls re-rendering SQL. Include arg internal fn .check_overwrite. DbMatrix pin writing. Use bquote force dbdir evaluation connection serialization. Remove non-existent vignette pkgdown config. Correct dbReconnect generic naming. Resolve roxygen doc warnings. Vignette build error. Add explicit package name mapping Remotes dbMatrix dbSpatial.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Add dbSpatial pin read/write support. dbProject R6 class. Support write/read dbMatrix pins. Add dbReconnect method connConnection. Add dbLoad generic loading dbverse objects export. Add dbList generic. DbData connection management infrastructure.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Tidy package metadata imports. Qualify utils head pin metadata. Track man/ documentation files. Update RoxygenNote. Require duckdb >= 1.4.0. Remove dbMatrix dbProject connection management files. Migrate dbverse-org. Add Remotes private repos update GH Actions PAT.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Document dbData extraction conn method aliases. Add troubleshooting vignette. Add connection management vignette (WIP). Update getting started vignette. Update site map new articles.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Reformat air+jarl. Apply air formatting dbproject-r.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Standardize dbProject connection API pin handling. Reorg internal funcs. Centralize internal type check funcs. Rename temporary view ‘_tmp_view’ row/col summary methods.

title: dbProject 0.0.0.9001 (2026-01-13)
text: Add basic tests.
